New Records: Jayson Tatum has scored 106 first-quarter points, 44 points more than the next-closest player on the leaderboard, Anthony Davis (62 first-quarter points)
Key Match Events: Jayson Tatum scored 26 points in the first half, guiding Boston to a 22-point advantage at the break
The Celtics' lead expanded to as many as 37 points in the second half
Pre-Game Insights: Jaylen Brown was sidelined for the second straight game with a strained left hip flexor
Post-Match Reflections: Jayson Tatum said he made the call on wearing the headband
Miscellaneous Highlights: Derrick White produced an all-around masterpiece as well, finishing as the game's second-leading scorer and assister behind Tatum
Others: The Celtics won their first 30-point victory of the season with a 123-93 win over the Hawks
